channel.title: Numbers on Twilio API Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in Numbers on Twilio API Explorer

item.title: Numbers v1
item.description: Phone Numbers API lets you search for available numbers, purchase and manage numbers. ACTIVE List all active phone numbers. console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/postman-params\/phone-numbers\/incoming.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Numbers v2 - Available
item.description: The new Global Phone Numbers Catalog API lets you search for available numbers to purchase and to manage active numbers. TYPE Search for available phone numbers by type (e.g. local, mobile, tollfree, shortcode.) console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/postman-params\/phone-numbers-v2\/available-type.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Numbers v2 - Active
item.description: The new Global Phone Numbers Catalog API lets you search for available numbers to purchase and to manage active numbers. LIST List all active phone numbers. Optionally filter by PhoneNumber, Geography, and Type (e.g. local, mobile, tollfree, shortcode.) console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/postman-params\/phone-numbers-v2\/active-list.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .
